statement.value: Select m.MarketId ,m.Name ,a.Address1 ,c.Name ,s.Abbreviation ,a.ZipCode ,Y(a.Location) ,X(a.Location) From MarketLink.Market m Left Join Common.Address a on a.AddressId = m.AddressId Left Join Common.City c on c.CityId = a.CityId Left Join Common.State s on s.StateId = c.StateId Left Join Common.Country co on co.CountryId = s.CountryId

Select m.Name ,a.Address1 ,c.Name ,s.Abbreviation ,a.ZipCode ,m.Url From MarketLink.Market m Left Join Common.Address a on a.AddressId = m.AddressId Left Join Common.City c on c.CityId = a.CityId Left Join Common.State s on s.StateId = c.StateId Where MarketId = ?
